str2: A primary particle; opposite, i.e. Instead or because of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
(a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
